Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bp NK-lysin SP-B domain core region

Literature.Title: Molecular characterization of the NK-lysin in a teleost fish, Boleophthalmus pectinirostris: Antimicrobial activity and immunomodulatory activity on monocytes/macrophages.
Literature.Author: Ding FF, Li CH, Chen J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus iniae ATCC 29178(no activity data),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(no activity data),Edwardsiella tarda Et-CD(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(no activity data),Escherichia coli K-12(no activity data),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 33866(MIC=50µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum ATCC 19264(no activity data),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 33847(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 17749(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Vibrio vulnificus ATCC 279562(no activity data)
